mapper.select: SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo", CH.category_id AS "ChildCategoryId", CH.name AS "ChildCategoryName" FROM category AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS CH on (C.category_id = CH.parent_id) ORDER BY C.category_id ASC
SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo" FROM category AS C WHERE parent_id IS null ORDER BY C.category_id ASC
SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo" FROM category AS C WHERE parent_id = #{id}; ORDER BY C.category_id ASC

SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo", CH.category_id AS "ChildCategoryId", CH.name AS "ChildCategoryName" FROM category AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS CH on (C.category_id = CH.parent_id) WHERE C.category_id = #{id}
